faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About AI Wallpaper Generator
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.

items.title: What is AI Wallpaper Generator and how does it work?
items.description: AI Wallpaper Generator is an advanced tool that uses artificial intelligence to create unique, high-quality wallpapers. Simply input your preferences or describe what you want, and our AI will generate beautiful, customized wallpapers for your devices.

items.title: What types of wallpapers can I create?
items.description: You can create various types of wallpapers including abstract art, nature scenes, minimalist designs, artistic patterns, and custom-themed wallpapers. Our AI can generate wallpapers in different styles, colors, and moods to match your preferences.

items.title: What resolutions are supported?
items.description: Our AI Wallpaper Generator supports multiple resolutions including standard phone sizes (1080x1920, 1440x3200), desktop resolutions (1920x1080, 2560x1440, 3840x2160), and tablet sizes. You can also request custom resolutions for specific devices.

items.title: How many wallpapers can I generate?
items.description: The number of wallpapers you can generate depends on your subscription plan. We offer different tiers with varying generation limits, from basic to unlimited generation options. Check our pricing page for detailed information.

items.title: Can I use the generated wallpapers commercially?
items.description: Yes, with our commercial license, you can use the generated wallpapers for commercial purposes. Each generated wallpaper comes with usage rights, and our commercial plans include extended licensing options for business use.

items.title: How do I get the best results?
items.description: For the best results, provide clear descriptions of what you want, specify your preferred style, colors, and mood. You can also use our style presets and reference images to guide the AI. Our platform includes tips and examples to help you create perfect wallpapers.
